conversation.content: Hello! Tell me about your family. How many people are in it?
I have four people in my family. We is happy.
That’s great! Who are the four people in your family?
Nice! What do you like to do together as a family?
That sounds fun! What kind of movies do you all enjoy watching?
Comedy movies are so fun! Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!
